author: Howard Boyle

comments.message: Hi Howard, interesting idea. Have you thought about more efficient ways of distributing these to households and educating the families on when and how to use these? We're excited to see this idea develop :) Here's some tips on evolving your idea - Evolve Your Thought Starter - http://ideo.pn/oi-evolve.

May also want to include a mirror and a alcohol swab to clean the area of the forehead due to body oils... These will not stick for very long  without doing so...  a small mirror so they can read it :)

description: Distribute Ebola information collateral to remote areas. temperature strips can be stuck to flyers and air dropped to remote areas.
